decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

In the absence of accurate dimensions confirming the maximum height of the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse, the proposal would not accord with criteria A.4(2)(a)(ii) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The total area of ground covered by the proposed extension and the existing outbuildings within the curtilage of the dwellinghouse would exceed 50% of the total area of the curtilage.  The proposal would not accord with criteria A.1(2) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the General Permitted Development Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason:

The total area of ground covered by the proposed extension and the existing outbuildings within the curtilage of the dwellinghouse would exceed 50% of the total area of the curtilage.  The proposal would not accord with criteria A.1(2) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 5M, EAVES HEIGHT OF 2.7M AND MAXIMUM HEIGHT 2.7M.
